title.text: Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2 Service Pack 3 (KB2979597)

description.text: Service Pack 3 for Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2 upgraded all Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2 instances and components installed through the SQL Server setup.  Service Pack 3 can upgrade all editions of Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2 to Service Pack 3 level. For customers in need of additional installation options, please visit the Microsoft Download Center and download the Service Pack 3 Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2. To learn more about Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2 SP3 please visit the Microsoft Support (http://support.microsoft.com) Knowledge Base article KB 2979597.
